algorithm.description: name of the ML algorithm. Example: linear_regression

task.description: description of ML task. Example: property prediction

property.description: name of the predicted or optimized characteristic

modelParameters.description: parameters of the fitted model. Example: regression model coefficients, score, intercept and data

modelCoefficients.description: weights/coefficients of the function from linear or non-linear fit

intercept.description: intercept from the linear fit of data points

score.description: metric for accuracy of the model

modelData.description: JSON object of input data used for model fitting
